item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exits 1B and 1C
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East at Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. Approaching Exit 1C - Amboy Road.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exit 1B
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East approaching Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. The mileposts along the I-26/I-240 overlap in Asheville use the distance from I-240. This is not usual for a primary route to use the mileposts for a loop route. However, I-26 becomes Future I-26 north of I-240.

item.title: I-26 West - Exit 33
item.description: I-26 west approaching Exit 33 - NC-191/To Blue Ridge Parkway.

item.title: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split
item.description: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split. Turn left for NC-191 north; continue straight on NC-280 for I-26.

item.title: NC-191 North/NC-280 East - Mills River
item.description: NC-191 North/NC-280 East in Mills River

item.title: NC-280 East at NC-191 South
item.description: NC-280 East at NC-191 South. Use NC-191 south for Hendersonville; continue on NC-280 east for Asheville.
